fixes.name: Calculation1
fixes.dax_expression:
SWITCH(
    TRUE(),
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Furniture", "furniture",
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Office Supplies", "office supplier",
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category] = "Technology", "technology",
    'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category]
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF/ELSEIF to DAX SWITCH(TRUE(), ...) and replaced [Category] with 'Orders (Sample - Superstore (1))'[Category]. This is a row-level string transformation, so it is implemented as a calculated column.
